channel.title: Community War
channel.description: A good friend of mine, Project Evolution (Anthony` on a fellow RuneScape development forum (hint hint)) has let me know that there's been a discussion over there talking about friendly competitions through gaming against other communities. The games that would be hosted would be free of course, but I was wondering if any of you would be interested in doing something like this. When I have more information I'll post it. ;)

item.title: Community War
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Whatever pc game is picked should be multi-platform as well. I don’t want to boot into windows.

Read full topic

item.title: Community War
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:73, topic:412502”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=513763.msg3731818#msg3731818 date=1314665528]

Pick a free PC game that everyone can play, even with shitty computers, that way more people can participate.

Hmm… Whats a crappy pc game, that all of us could play, that alot of people can play on at once. I got it!

Lol’d. I’m sure most people wouldn’t want to do a clan war on Runescape.

What about a private server. (Being serious here)
[/quote]

Much better chance of having a war on real runescape than someone’s shitty server.[/quote]

Hyperion is well-liked on both communities correct? We can’t set up a quick Multi-PVP server? I kind of like this idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Community War
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:67, topic:412502”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=513763.msg3731645#msg3731645 date=1314659791]

No I think just little PC games would be better. Chess, minigolf, idk some little stupid online games. Console would be to much of a hassle.

Yeah, but that part is just to satisfy those who want them on consoles

You expect everyone to go out and buy a dumbass game on a console, just for a competition between private server communities?

No… im saying its for the people who have consoles and want to do wars on consoles… this way everyone can participate… each category for each type of game will have a champion… only those with consoles will compete in those and the ones who want to compete in the pc war will compete in that…
[/quote]Good luck on organizing that,[/quote]
The people competing on the said console would set things up… easier for everyone :o

and its just an idea.

Read full topic

[/quote]Or we could make exclusive games for this competition, for example that zombie shooter project on the game development forums, now that we’re speaking about it, what’s going on with that project? Did you guys stop it?[/quote]
From what it seems… i guess…

OT

I think this is how it should be:
3 Categories

Ps3

Xbox

PC

Each category has:

Chess/checkers

An fps game

and a “other” game
